title: Visitor Visa (Subclass 600)
requirements: Financial proof (bank statements, payslips, sponsor letter)
Evidence of ties to home country
text: Allows short-term stays for tourism, visiting family/friends, or business. Requirements: Valid passport (≥6 months), passport photos, ImmiAccount application, visa fee receipt, travel itinerary, financial proof (bank statements, payslips, sponsor letter), employment/student/retirement proof, cover letter, evidence of ties to home country, travel insurance, health declaration.

title: Student Visa (Subclass 500)
text: Allows full-time study at a registered Australian institution. Required: Confirmation of Enrolment (CoE), valid passport, birth certificate, photos, academic transcripts, English test scores (IELTS/TOEFL/PTE), proof of funds (~AUD 29,710), bank statements, sponsor letters, education loan docs, OSHC, police clearance, Genuine Student statement.

title: Family and Partner Visas
text: For family members, partners, or dependents of Australian citizens/PRs. Required: Passports, birth certificates, marriage/relationship certificates, sponsor citizenship/PR proof, financial docs, health/character checks, relationship evidence, adoption/dependency proof. Parent/Partner/Child subclasses have specific requirements.

title: Working and Skilled Visas
text: For skilled professionals. Subclasses: 189, 190, 482, 491. Key requirements: Valid passport, photos, birth certificates, ImmiAccount application, skills assessment, English test, employment reference letters, payslips, education certificates, health/character certificates, employer/state nomination.

title: Refugee and Humanitarian Visas
text: For individuals facing persecution or humanitarian crises. Required: Valid passport, photos, birth certificates, refugee status proof (UNHCR), identity docs, travel history, statements of persecution, health/character assessments, sponsorship/recommendation.

title: Business / Investment Visas (Subclass 188 & 888)
text: For entrepreneurs, investors, business owners. Key docs: Passport, identity proof, visa form/fee, EOI, nomination, business registration/licenses/tax returns, audited financials, assets/source of funds, business plan/investment proposal, complying investment evidence, health/police clearances, English test, certified color PDFs. Stream-specific: Innovation, Investor, Significant Investor, Entrepreneur, Permanent (888).

title: Permanent Residency (PR) Visas
text: For skilled workers, nominated professionals, employer-sponsored applicants. Checklist: Passport, birth certificate, national ID, skill assessment, qualifications, employment proofs, English test, medical/police clearances, nomination/sponsorship, financial/asset proof, certified translations.

title: General Documents Required for All Canada Visa Types
requirements: Two recent passport photos (50mm x 70mm, white background)
Proof of financial support (bank statements, income, sponsor letter)
Proof of ties to India (employment, property, family)
text: Valid passport (≥6 months), previous visas/travel history, completed application form (e.g., IMM 5257), two recent passport photos (50mm x 70mm, white background), proof of financial support (bank statements, income, sponsor letter), travel itinerary, accommodation details, purpose of visit (travel plan/invitation/acceptance/job offer), proof of ties to India (employment, property, family), biometrics (BIL from VAC).

title: Visitor Visa (Tourist Visa)
text: Tourism, family visits, short business trips, conferences. Up to 6 months per visit (multiple entries for up to 10 years or passport expiry). Key: Proof of funds, strong ties to India, intent to return, invitation letter, travel insurance.

title: Study Permit (Student Visa)
text: Enrolment in Canadian DLI. Required: Acceptance letter, tuition payment proof, statement of purpose, proof of funds, sponsor docs, biometrics, medical exam, police clearance.

title: Work Permit
text: Employment in Canada based on job offer. Required: Job offer letter, LMIA (if applicable), work experience docs, biometrics, medical exam, police clearance.

title: Permanent Residence
text: Express Entry, PR. Required: Express Entry profile, educational credentials, language test results (IELTS/CELPIP/TEF), police clearance, medical exam, proof of funds, sponsor docs.

title: Transit Visa
text: Passing through a Canadian airport. Up to 48 hours. Required: Valid passport, confirmed onward travel.

title: Business Visa
text: Business activities (meetings, contracts). Short-term, usually within visitor visa parameters. Required: Invitation letter from Canadian host, business itinerary.

title: General Documents Required for U.S. Visa Application
requirements: Evidence of ties to home country
text: Valid passport (≥6 months), older/expired passports, recent passport-style photo(s), DS-160 confirmation (or DS-260/other form), appointment confirmation letter, bank statements, proof of assets, salary slips, tax records, employment letter/business registration/pay stub, affidavit of support/sponsorship letter, birth/marriage/divorce certificates, educational transcripts/diplomas/certificates, police clearance/criminal record, medical exam/vaccination records (immigrant visas), travel itinerary/invitation/conference letters, evidence of ties to home country, certified translations.

title: Student Visa (F/M)
text: For full-time study in the U.S. Required: Valid passport, DS-160 confirmation, I-20 or DS-2019 form, SEVIS fee receipt, acceptance letter from U.S. institution, proof of funds, bank statements, sponsor letters, academic transcripts, English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS), passport-style photo(s), visa application fee receipt, appointment confirmation letter.

title: Business Visa (B-1)
text: For short-term business activities in the U.S. Required: Valid passport, DS-160 confirmation, invitation letter from U.S. company, business itinerary, proof of funds, bank statements, employment letter, tax records, passport-style photo(s), visa application fee receipt, appointment confirmation letter.

title: Work Visa (H, L, O, etc.)
text: For employment in the U.S. Required: Valid passport, DS-160 confirmation, approved petition (I-129, I-797), job offer letter, proof of qualifications, employment letter, bank statements, tax records, passport-style photo(s), visa application fee receipt, appointment confirmation letter.
